ABOUT_KARROT.EXISTING_GROUPS: A few groups already using Karrot

ACTIVITIES.DESCRIPTION: Each activity has a number of slots which members of the group can sign up for – this way everyone knows who goes where and when, and feedback can be given later.
ACTIVITIES.SUBTITLE: Activities with a specific time and place, like food pickups in the case of foodsaving, can be entered in the software.
ACTIVITIES.TITLE: Distribution of tasks and activities

COMMUNICATION.DESCRIPTION: Write a message that everyone in the group will see or a private message to someone. Everything related to a single activity or place can be discussed in their respective chats.
COMMUNICATION.TITLE: Communication in the right context

DEMOCRATIC.DESCRIPTION: Karrot is a free and open-source software developed with the feedback and participation of the people who use it. It is mainly developed by a small core team that is constantly in contact with people in different groups, in order to make sense of their diverging and converging needs and thus guide the development. We abide by the ethics of integrity and non-commercialization of data.
DEMOCRATIC.DESCRIPTION2: Developers and designers are obviously welcome to participate in its development. Check out the project on {code}.
DEMOCRATIC.TITLE: Democratic and participative development

GROUPS.DESCRIPTION: Yet they are all displayed on the map so that people can find and connect to other groups in their location and even globally.
GROUPS.SUBTITLE: Every group on karrot is completely independent and can have their own logo, processes and rules.
GROUPS.TITLE: Independent groups

MAPS.DESCRIPTION: You have a map of where the places and the people doing the activities are located. You have a nice list of upcoming activities and can sign up for them online.
MAPS.TITLE: Maps and lists

NOTIFICATIONS.DESCRIPTION: You get notified about empty activities, new messages and new people wanting to join your group. But you can also turn it all off if you wish more peace!
NOTIFICATIONS.TITLE: Notifications

OFFERS.DESCRIPTION: Offers are visible to everyone in the group and people can show their interest on the offer's chat.
OFFERS.SUBTITLE: Create an ad-like offer of whatever you want to share or give away.
OFFERS.TITLE: Share things

OPENSOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Everything is transparent and possibly changeable. We encourage groups to host their own instances of the platform, if they have the ability to do so. Still, we also provide access to a hosted version on karrot.world.
OPENSOURCE.TITLE: Open source

TEAM.DESCRIPTION: You can easily talk to the people developing Karrot, either on our {forum}, on {code} or in real-time on our {chat}.
TEAM.TITLE: Responsive team

TRANSLATIONS.DESCRIPTION: Karrot is fully translatable by the community and many languages are already added. To contribute more translations just visit the project on {translations}.
TRANSLATIONS.TITLE: Multi-language

TRANSPARENCY.DESCRIPTION: The history shows who did what and when. Everything from participating in an activity to creating and editing places is logged here.
TRANSPARENCY.TITLE: Transparency

TRUST.DESCRIPTION: There are no admin superpowers in a Karrot group. People who receive enough trust-carrots from their peers will be able to edit and change settings in the group. When new people want to join your group they need to apply and answer questions your group can set, which anyone with editing rights can decline or approve. Likewise, if there is a conflict, the group can enter a voting system to resolve it in a communal way.
TRUST.TITLE: Democratic and trust-based group management

ABOUT_KARROT.SUBTITLE1: Karrot exists for groups of people who want to save things from being wasted and share them instead, allowing these groups to organise efficiently, on a local and voluntary basis.
ABOUT_KARROT.SUBTITLE2: Things such as food, bikes, clothes or whatever is being excessively thrown away or unused in the context of a consumerist society.
ABOUT_KARROT.TITLE: Save things from being wasted, share them instead!
ABOUT_KARROT.VISION_INTRO: Karrot is a tool for all kinds of grassroots initiatives to connect and grow, supporting the co-ordination of face-to-face activities with a layer of digital infrastructure.

ACTIVITYDELETE.DELETE_SERIES_TEXT: आपण खरोखर ही आवर्ती पिकअप तारीख हटवू इच्छिता? हे या आवर्ती पिकअप तारखेशी संबंधित सर्व वन-टाइम पिकअप तारिख देखील हटवेल (लोक आधीपासूनच सामील झाले असतील तर मात्र हटवले जाणार नाही).

ACTIVITYLIST.ACTIVITY_STARTED: हे पिकअप आधीपासून सुरू झाले आहे.

ACTIVITYLIST.AVAILABLE_FROM_STORES: This shows pickups from your favorite places in the next days. You can access other places in the sidebar.

ACTIVITYLIST.STORE_NONE_HINT: आपण पिकअप व्यवस्थापित पृष्ठावर नवीन पिकअप तयार करू शकता.

ACTIVITYMANAGE.ACTIVITY_DOES_NOT_MATCH: ही पिकअपची तारीख पुनरावृत्ती नमुन्याशी जुळत नाही
ACTIVITYMANAGE.TITLE: पिकअप व्यवस्थापित करा

ACTIVITY_FEEDBACK.AMOUNT: Amount of food you were able to save (in kg)
ACTIVITY_FEEDBACK.AMOUNT_INFO: For place statistics, we will add together the amount of all feedback.
ACTIVITY_FEEDBACK.COMMENT_PLACEHOLDER: सर्वकाही ठीक आहे का? प्रत्येकजण आले होते का? येथे आपली टिप्पणी ...
ACTIVITY_FEEDBACK.TITLE: अभिप्राय

AGREEMENT.BLURB1: You don't have an agreement yet!
AGREEMENT.BLURB2: If you add one then people will have to agree to it before they can do pickups.

REMOVE.MESSAGE: This means anyone will be able to do a pickup
REMOVE.TITLE: Remove agreement?

REPLACE.MESSAGE: Everyone will have to agree again before they can signup for pickups
REPLACE.TITLE: Change agreement?

AGREEMENT.MINOR_EDIT_HELPER: Typos, formatting, etc... people will not be asked to re-agree
AGREEMENT.TITLE: Title
AGREEMENT.TITLE_HELPER: Give your agreement a title, e.g. Community Rules

APPLICATION.ACCEPT_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you sure you want to accept {userName} into this group?
APPLICATION.DECLINE_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: Are you sure you want to decline the application of {userName}?
APPLICATION.GALLERY_TOOLTIP: You applied to join this group. Your application is still pending.
APPLICATION.HELP: This is a chat between all existing members of {groupName} and the new applicant {userName}. It is meant to give you all a chance to get to know you before deciding whether to accept, decline or withdraw the application.
APPLICATION.WALL_NOTICE: There is an application pending! | There are {count} applications pending!

INFO.MESSAGE: This is a score voting in which group members with editing permissions can participate to determine how to deal with a social conflict that affects the whole group.
INFO.TITLE: How does this process work?

REQUIREMENTS.ACTIVE_EDITORS: Your group has {activeEditorsCount} active users with editing permissions. You need {requiredCount} to start a conflict resolution process.
REQUIREMENTS.NEWCOMER: Before you can start a conflict resolution process, you need to receive more trust and gain editing permissions. In the meantime, please ask a fellow group member to start the process for you.

CONFLICT.STEPPER1a: You are about to start a group-wide conflict resolution process!
CONFLICT.STEPPER1b: This will involve all members with editing permissions to find the best way to proceed.
CONFLICT.STEPPER2a: Thank you for caring for your community!
CONFLICT.STEPPER2b: It is important to address social issues, although it can be unpleasant sometimes. Thank you for your courage!
CONFLICT.STEPPER3b: This process will start a chat and a vote.
CONFLICT.STEPPER3c: The chat will be visible for members with editing permissions and includes {userName}.
CONFLICT.STEPPER3d: The voting is anonymous. It will go on for {votingDuration} days. During this time all voters can change their minds and vote differently as many times as they want.
CONFLICT.STEPPER4a: Please explain why you are starting this conflict resolution process!
CONFLICT.STEPPER4b: Tell your group what made you think this process is justified and needed. This statement will be visible to {userName} and group members with editing permissions.

VOTING.HEADLINE: How do you want to proceed with the ongoing conflict with {userName}?

CONFLICT.WITH: This process is to resolve a conflict with {userName}

CONVERSATION.CLOSED: This conversation has been closed automatically.
CONVERSATION.NOT_PARTICIPATED: By sending a message, you will be subscribed to notifications about this conversation.
CONVERSATION.UNREAD_MESSAGES: You have one unread message. | You have {count} unread messages.

CREATEACTIVITY.COMMENT_HELPER: या पिकअपवर साइन अप करताना लोकांना काय कळले पाहिजे?
CREATEACTIVITY.DIFFERS_WARNING: हे मूल्य डिफॉल्टपेक्षा वेगळे आहे. हा बदल पूर्ववत करण्यासाठी, बाण बटणावर क्लिक करा आणि बदल जतन करा
CREATEACTIVITY.ENABLE_DISABLE_MESSAGE: या पिकअपमध्ये सामील झालेले वापरकर्ते सूचना प्राप्त करतील. कारण देण्यासाठी आपण हा मजकूर बदलू शकता:
CREATEACTIVITY.EXCEPTIONS_MESSAGE: काही आगामी पिकअप या आवर्ती पिकअपच्या सेटिंग्जशी जुळत नाहीत. आवश्यक असल्यास, पिकअप बदलण्यासाठी किंवा अक्षम करण्यासाठी 'येथे' {upcomingLabel} खाली एक नजर टाका.
CREATEACTIVITY.MAX_PARTICIPANTS_HELPER: पिकअपमध्ये किती लोकांनी भाग घेतला पाहिजे?

FEEDBACKLIST.NONE_HINT: अधिक फीडबॅक उपलब्ध झाल्यानंतर हे पृष्ठ भरले जाईल
FEEDBACKLIST.NO_DONE_ACTIVITIES_HINT: आपल्याकडे अभिप्राय देण्यासाठी सध्या कोणतेही पिकअप नाहीत. आपण दुसर्या पिकअपमध्ये सामील का होत नाही?
FEEDBACKLIST.SAVED_FOOD: येथे किमान 1 किलो जतन केले गेले. धन्यवाद! | लोकांनी आधीच जतन केलेल्या आहाराच्या {amount} किलोसाठी फीडबॅक दिले! असे चांगले कार्य चालू ठेवा!

GLOBAL.INVALID_LINK: क्षमस्व, आपण उघडलेला दुवा अवैध आहे.

GROUP.APPLICATION_QUESTIONS: या गटात सामील होऊ इच्छित असलेल्या लोकांसाठी प्रश्न

REQUEST_DELETE_ACCOUNT.MESSAGE: तुला खात्री आहे? आपले खाते आणि आपला वैयक्तिक डेटा कायमचा हटविला जाईल. आपण या प्लॅटफॉर्मवर केलेले काहीही अनामित केले जाईल. आपण पुष्टी केल्यास, आम्ही हटविण्याची प्रक्रिया पूर्ण करण्यासाठी आपल्याला एका दुव्यासह एक ई-मेल पाठवतो.

USERDATA.FIRST_TRUST: Be the first one to trust {userName} in {groupName}!

USERDATA.NEWCOMER_INFO: You are currently a newcomer in {groupName} and you can become active by writing messages, meeting fellow members, doing pickups and giving feedback. As soon as {threshold} members expressed their trust in you, you will gain editing permissions to help with group administration.
USERDATA.OTHER_PEOPLE_TRUST_USER: {otherUser}, {groupName} मधील वर  विश्वास ठेवतात . |   {count} लोक  {groupName} मधील  {userName}{userName} वर विश्वास ठेवतात.

USERDATA.PEOPLE_TRUST_USER: You and {otherUser} trust {userName} in {groupName}. | You and {count} other people trust {userName} in {groupName}.
